title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 192.5 - Employment certificates required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 192.5 - Employment certificates required

State Regulations

Standard employment certificates will be required for the
employment of pupils in canneries and milk plants. Farmwork permits will be
required for minors 14 or 15 years of age if employed in farm service by others
than their parents, guardians or custodians. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
192.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
